data.title: Bridgette Wilson | Biography, Age, Net Worth, Relationship, Career
data.meta_description: Miss Teen USA in 1990 was Bridgette Wilson, former American actress, singer and model. She played Lisa Fenimore on the soap opera Santa Barbara. Former
data.text:
Miss Teen USA in 1990 was Bridgette Wilson, former American actress, singer and model. She played Lisa Fenimore on the soap opera Santa Barbara.

Former ATP tennis player Pete Sampras is the actor’s husband; They have two sons together, Christian Charles Sampras and Ryan Nikolaos Sampras.

What is Bridgette Wilson’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

According to Celebrity Net Worth, Bridgette Wilson, 46, has a net worth of $25 million as of 2020. She owns a beautiful property in Bel Air, California, with her husband Pete Sampras, which they paid for. $6 million for 2014.

A home in Brentwood, Los Angeles, which the couple also owned, sold in 2017 for $7.5 million. The house has seven bathrooms and six bedrooms.

They also own a luxury car, a Mercedes-Benz G500. In 2020, Pete Sampras, her spouse, was worth $150 million.

Where was Bridgette Wilson born? Ethnicity, nationality, family and education

On September 25, 1973, Bridgette Wilson was born in Gold Beach, Oregon, United States, to parents Dale Wilson. Wilson, Kathy and Wilson There are Dale Wilson’s sisters.

He has American citizenship and Caucasian descent. She is 54 kg tall and 5 feet 9 inches wide. Wilson has a background in education, as he attended Gold Beach High School and graduated in 1991. While still in high school, Wilson played volleyball for the varsity team.

Bridget Wilson is married. The Santa Barbara celebrity is married to former ATP tennis great Pete Sampras. The couple married on September 30, 2000 in a lavish ceremony in front of their close friends, family and co-stars. They have enjoyed being married ever since.

Is Bridgette Wilson single? Relationship

The couple’s children are Christian Charles Sampras, born November 21, 2002, and Ryan Nikolaos Sampras, born July 29, 2005.

When Sampras saw Wilson for the first time in a Los Angeles movie theater in 1999, their charming love story officially began. He described what happened as follows:

I half-jokingly told my friend, “I would love to meet her,” in response.

He claims that one of his coworkers set them up on a date and introduced them. Over time, their courtship blossomed into an undeniable romance and they married in 2000. The family currently calls Bel Air, California their home.

How did Bridgette Wilson start her professional career?

After being crowned Miss Teen USA three years earlier, Bridgette Wilson began her acting career.

In the 1993 fantasy action comedy Last Action Hero, starring Charles Dance, Austin O’Brien, Mercedes Ruehl and Arnold Schwarzenegger, she made her acting debut as Whitney/Meredith.

Wilson co-starred with Marcy Walker, A Martinez, Lane Davies and Robin Wright on the popular NBC soap opera series Santa Barbara from April 1992 to January 1993 as Lisa Fenimore.

Since then, he has had other television appearances, including episodes of Murder, She Wrote, Saved By The Bell, The Street and Carpoolers.

His filmography includes roles in films such as Billy Madison, Mortal Kombat, Nixon, I Know What You Did Last Summer, House on Haunted Hill, Buying the Cow, The Suburbans & Love Stinks, Sweet Evil, Extreme Ops and The Wedding Planner.

Additionally, she appeared as a guest on an episode of CSI Miami.
